messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Books, re: Parent self esteem
messages.msgSnippet: I was just going to suggest Leo Buscalia.... anything by him. There are also tapes that I listen to in the car of his. I love him! Kelli Laramike12@aol.com
messages.messageBody:
I was just going to suggest Leo Buscalia.... anything by him. There are also tapes that I listen to in the car of his. I love him! Kelli
Laramike12@... wrote:
In a message dated 4/8/03 3:12:52 AM, starsuncloud@... writes:

<< Deepak Chopras writings,
especially "The Path to Love".
Also Sara Ban Breathnachs "Simple Abundance" and "Excavating your Authentic
Self" >>

All three great books! Some others that might interest you are "The Seat of
the Soul" & "Soul Stories" by Gary Zukav, and "Love" by Leo Buscaglia. HTH,
Lara..........
